channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Need The MCU’s Fantastic Four Movie To Break A Tragic Marvel Film Trend That’s Currently Lasted For 20 Years
item.description: I'm reallly hoping that the MCU's Fantastic Four: First Steps will be able to break a tragic 20-year trend when it comes to Marvel's First Family.

item.title: Kevin Bacon’s Cult Classic ‘90s Horror Movie Getting New Streaming Home As Franchise Revival Talks Get Underway
item.description: A '90s cult classic horror-comedy movie starring Kevin Bacon is getting a new home on a streaming platform, amid discussions of a franchise revival.

item.title: Karate Kid: Legends Is Smartly Avoiding The Oldest Daniel LaRusso & Johnny Lawrence Debate
item.description: One Daniel LaRusso and Johnny Lawrence debate remains unresolved after all these years, but it looks like Karate Kid: Legends is cleverly avoiding it.

item.title: Diddy May Have Forced an Alleged Victim to Undergo Medical Procedure, Prosecutors Claim
item.description: Diddy may have forced one of the alleged victims in his federal case to undergo a medical procedure ... at least that's what prosecutors are claiming....

item.title: Steelers Pick Derrick Harmon's Mom Passes Away Shortly After NFL Draft

item.title: Bert Kreischer Strips Off Shirt in Raunchy 'Jennifer Hudson Show' Spirit Tunnel Dance
